Articles.Content:
Hello, so recently with 1.0.5 released, I've tried to make an Eve lander that can return to Kerbin - quite an undertaking!:cool:. So far I've managed to rustle up this:

[SIZE=2][URL]http://imgur.com/HJ7mmia[/URL] (Imgur embedding hates me:()

The bottom two stages with the 3 Vectors and Aerospike fetch 6.25km/s of Dv, which I know is not enough to get an orbit, but my third ion stage gets over 9km/s - would it be feasible to boost my Ap up using the first two stages, and then circularise with the ions?
And if not, how could I tweak my design to squeeze more Dv out?

Thanks in advance.

[/SIZE]
I doubt you will have enough time to circularize with the ions. What's the TWR on the ion stage?
The TWR of the ion stage is, by my calculations, approximately 0.13.
I'd try monoprop or spark engines for the last stage. They are also lightweight and have better TWR
Spark engines have the second-best TWR in the game after the Vector engine, so I say the Spark.
